channel.title: hobby-project on Ayrat's Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in hobby-project on Ayrat's Braindump

item.title: El Monitorro
item.description: El Monitorro is a telegram bot for reading RSS, Atom and JSON feeds. It’s written in Rust. It has a landing site generated from its Readme and Changelog Key features: High performance. All processing is done with Fang Filters - users can provide key words he wants to subscribe to Templates - users can set a format of messages

item.title: emacs env for elixir
item.description: Create a setup for elixir dev in emacs. Like unmaintained `alchemist`

item.title: Frankenstein
item.description: Frankenstein is a telegram client written Rust. Key features: Simplicity Small number of dependencies Http client can be replaced with any library Backlog: Think about separating objects.rs and api_params.rs into separate files for each struct
